<!--[if lt IE 7]><style type="text/css">body{behavior:url("/w/skins/vector/csshover.min.htc")}</style><![endif]--></head>
<body class="mediawiki ltr sitedir-ltr ns-0 ns-subject page-List_of_countries_by_population skin-vector action-view vector-animateLayout">
		<div id="mw-page-base" class="noprint"></div>
		<div id="mw-head-base" class="noprint"></div>
		<div id="content" class="mw-body" role="main">
			<a id="top"></a>
			<div id="mw-js-message" style="display:none;"></div>
						<h1 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading" lang="en"><span dir="auto">List of countries by population</span></h1>
			<div id="bodyContent">
								<div id="siteSub">From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia</div>
								<div id="contentSub"></div>
												<div id="jump-to-nav" class="mw-jump">
					Jump to:					<a href="#mw-navigation">navigation</a>, 					<a href="#p-search">search</a>
				</div>
				<div id="mw-content-text" lang="en" dir="ltr" class="mw-content-ltr"><p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Mergefrom&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Mergefrom (page does not exist)">Template:Mergefrom</a>
<a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Main_category&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Main category (page does not exist)">Template:Main category</a>
</p>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:182px;"><a href="/wiki/File:File_World_population.png" title="File:File World population.png">File:File World population.png</a>  <div class="thumbcaption">A map of world population. Gray-scale legend: 0 to 50&#160;M to 400&#160;M to 1,336&#160;M (million)</div></div></div>
<p>This is a list of <a href="/wiki/List_of_sovereign_states" title="List of sovereign states">independent countries</a> and inhabited <a href="/wiki/Dependent_territory" title="Dependent territory">dependent territories</a>—based on the ISO standard <a href="/wiki/ISO_3166-1" title="ISO 3166-1">ISO 3166-1</a>—by <a href="/wiki/Population" title="Population">population</a>. Also given in percent is each country's population compared to the <a href="/w/index.php?title=World_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="World population (page does not exist)">population of the world</a>, which according to the <a href="/wiki/United_States_Census_Bureau" title="United States Census Bureau">United States Census Bureau</a> population clock is estimated at <strong class="error">Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character &quot;[&quot;.</strong>&#160;billion.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup>
</p><p>According to a separate estimate by the <a href="/wiki/United_Nations" title="United Nations">United Nations</a>, world population exceeded 7&#160;billion in October 2011.<sup id="cite_ref-UN7bn_2-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-UN7bn-2">[2]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3">[3]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4">[4]</a></sup> Areas that form integral parts of sovereign states, such as the <a href="/w/index.php?title=Countries_of_the_United_Kingdom&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Countries of the United Kingdom (page does not exist)">countries of the United Kingdom</a>, are counted as part of the sovereign states concerned. Not included are other entities, such as the <a href="/wiki/European_Union" title="European Union">European Union</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5">[5]</a></sup> that are not sovereign states, and dependent territories that do not have permanent populations, such as <a href="/w/index.php?title=Territorial_claims_of_Antarctica&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Territorial claims of Antarctica (page does not exist)">various countries' claims</a> to <a href="/w/index.php?title=Antarctica&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Antarctica (page does not exist)">Antarctica</a>.
</p><p>Figures used in this chart are based on the most up to date estimate or projections<sup id="cite_ref-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-6">[6]</a></sup> by the national <a href="/wiki/Census" title="Census">census</a> authority where available, and are usually rounded off. Where updated national data are not available, figures are based on the 2013 estimates by the Population Division of the <a href="/w/index.php?title=United_Nations_Department_of_Economic_and_Social_Affairs&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (page does not exist)">United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-unpop_7-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-unpop-7">[7]</a></sup> Because the compiled figures are not collected at the same time in every country, or at the same level of <a href="/wiki/Statistics" title="Statistics">accuracy</a>, the resulting numerical comparisons may create misleading conclusions. Furthermore, the addition of figures from all countries may not equal the world total.  A handful of nations have not conducted a headcount in over 3 decades, leaving us with high error margin estimates only.
</p><p>For a graphical version of this list, see <a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_population_(graphical)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by population (graphical) (page does not exist)">list of countries by population (graphical)</a>. See also <a href="/wiki/List_of_sovereign_states_and_dependent_territories_by_population_density" title="List of sovereign states and dependent territories by population density">List of sovereign states and dependent territories by population density</a> and the <a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_regional_organizations_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of regional organizations by population (page does not exist)">list of regional organizations by population</a>.
</p>
<div id="toc" class="toc"><div id="toctitle"><h2>Contents</h2></div>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-1"><a href="#Countries"><span class="tocnumber">1</span> <span class="toctext">Countries</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-2"><a href="#See_also"><span class="tocnumber">2</span> <span class="toctext">See also</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-3"><a href="#References_and_notes"><span class="tocnumber">3</span> <span class="toctext">References and notes</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-4"><a href="#External_links"><span class="tocnumber">4</span> <span class="toctext">External links</span></a></li>
</ul>
</div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Countries">Countries</span></h2>
<p><b>Note:</b> All dependent territories are shown in <i>italics</i>.
</p>
<table class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:right">

<tr>
<th data-sort-type="number">Rank</th>
<th>Country (or dependent territory)</th>
<th>Population</th>
<th>Date</th>
<th>% of world<br />population</th>
<th>Source
</th></tr>
<tr>
<td> –

<td align="left"><a href="/wiki/World" title="World">World</a>

<td><strong class="error">Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character &quot;[&quot;.</strong>
</td>
<td>April 7, 2017
</td>
<td>100%
</td>

</td></tr>

</td>
<td align="left"><i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Country_data_Tokelau&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Country data Tokelau (page does not exist)">Template:Country data Tokelau</a></i> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=New_Zealand&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="New Zealand (page does not exist)">NZ</a>)
</td>
<td>1,411
</td>
<td>October 18, 2011
</td>
<td>0.0000<strong class="error">Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character &quot;[&quot;.</strong>%
</td>
<td align="left"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/demographic/sources/census/2010_PHC/Tokelau/report.pdf">Final 2011 census result</a>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td>242
</td>
<td align="left"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Country_data_Vatican_City&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Country data Vatican City (page does not exist)">Template:Country data Vatican City</a>
</td>
<td>839
</td>
<td>July 1, 2012
</td>
<td>0.0000<strong class="error">Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character &quot;[&quot;.</strong>%
</td>
<td align="left"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.vaticanstate.va/content/vaticanstate/es/stato-e-governo/note-generali/popolazione.html">Official estimate</a>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td>243
</td>
<td align="left"><i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:CCK&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:CCK (page does not exist)">Template:CCK</a></i> (<a href="/w/index.php?title=Australia&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Australia (page does not exist)">Australia</a>)
</td>
<td>596
</td>
<td>January 14, 2014
</td>
<td>0.00000<strong class="error">Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character &quot;[&quot;.</strong>%
</td>

</td></tr>
<tr>
<td>244
</td>
<td align="left"><i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Country_data_Pitcairn_Islands&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Country data Pitcairn Islands (page does not exist)">Template:Country data Pitcairn Islands</a></i> (<a href="/wiki/United_Kingdom" title="United Kingdom">UK</a>)
</td>
<td>56
</td>
<td>February 1, 2013
</td>
<td>0.000000<strong class="error">Expression error: Unrecognized punctuation character &quot;[&quot;.</strong>%
</td>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also">See also</span></h2>
<p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Multicol&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Multicol (page does not exist)">Template:Multicol</a>
</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_population_(United_Nations)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by population (United Nations) (page does not exist)">List of countries by population (United Nations)</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/List_of_sovereign_states_and_dependent_territories_by_population_density" title="List of sovereign states and dependent territories by population density">List of sovereign states and dependent territories by population density</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_continents_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of continents by population (page does not exist)">List of continents by population</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_refugee_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by refugee population (page does not exist)">List of countries by refugee population</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_urban_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by urban population (page does not exist)">List of countries by urban population</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_regional_organizations_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of regional organizations by population (page does not exist)">List of regional organizations by population</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/List_of_religious_populations" title="List of religious populations">List of religious populations</a>
</li>
</ul>
<p><br />
</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=World_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="World population (page does not exist)">World population</a>
</li>
</ul>
<p><b>Historical</b>
</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_population_in_1900&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by population in 1900 (page does not exist)">List of countries by population in 1900</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/List_of_countries_by_population_in_1907" title="List of countries by population in 1907">List of countries by population in 1907</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_population_in_2000&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by population in 2000 (page does not exist)">List of countries by population in 2000</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_population_in_2005&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by population in 2005 (page does not exist)">List of countries by population in 2005</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_population_in_2010&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by population in 2010 (page does not exist)">List of countries by population in 2010</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_by_past_and_future_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries by past and future population (page does not exist)">List of countries by past and future population</a> (1950–2050)
</li>
</ul>
<p><b>Cities:</b>
</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=World%27s_largest_cities&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="World's largest cities (page does not exist)">World's largest cities</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_national_capitals_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of national capitals by population (page does not exist)">List of national capitals by population</a>
</li>
</ul>
<p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Multicol-break&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Multicol-break (page does not exist)">Template:Multicol-break</a>
{{#invoke:Portal|portal}}
</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Lists of countries by population</b>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><ul>

</li>

</li>

</li>

</li>

</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><ul>
<li><b>Intercontinental</b>
<ul>

</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_countries_in_the_Americas_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of countries in the Americas by population (page does not exist)">Americas</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Arab_countries_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Arab countries by population (page does not exist)">Arab states</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_members_of_the_Commonwealth_of_Nations_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of members of the Commonwealth of Nations by population (page does not exist)">Commonwealth of Nations</a>
</li>

</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Middle_East_countries_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Middle East countries by population (page does not exist)">Middle East</a>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><ul>
<li><b>Subcontinental</b>
<ul>

</li>
<li><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_European_Union_member_states_by_population&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of European Union member states by population (page does not exist)">European Union member states</a>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References_and_notes">References and notes</span></h2>

</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="External_links">External links</span></h2>
<ul>
<li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.un.org/esa/population/publications/WPP2004/WPP2004_Volume3.htm">United Nations Analytical Report for the 2004 revision of World Population Prospects</a> (the analytical report for the 2006 revision is not available online)&#160;— includes details of methodology and sources used for the population estimates above.
</li>
</ul>
